p: Overall, 1,397 HIV-1 infected participants were included. Most were male (82.9%; 1,158/1,397), originated from Germany (69.6%; 972/1,397), and infected with HIV-1 subtype B (72.8%; 1,017/1,397). The most commonly reported transmission risk was men who have sex with men (MSM) (56.7%; 792/1,397) ( Table 1).
